title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-2.5 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-2.5 - Applications

State Regulations

Applications for a permit to construct or abandon a water well shall be directed to the permit issuing official by the applicant or his agent and shall be on a form prescribed by the State Department of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
